channel.title: Livestream rehearsal - feedback please?
channel.description:
Hi all, I'm planning on doing a bit of ttrpg related streaming during the shutdown. I've done a rehearsal (30 min length) anyone willing to give it a listen and give any feedback?
https://youtu.be/uWltu8j5xlc
I'm not so interested in feedback like 'Get a better microphone', but whether you think this stream would be at all interesting, whether there's anything I can improve in presentation and if I'm doing anything dangerous in sharing some 'behind the scenes' website stuff.
Thanks in advance!

item.title: Livestream rehearsal - feedback please?
